Description:
Tranquil Oasis!
Admire the private position and exclusive style of this single-level villa, set well back from the street and tailor made for easy enjoyment. 2/9 Gaddang Court is a great opportunity to buy into the booming Clifton Springs property market.
This secluded oasis, is a beautifully presented blank canvas with its house-like feel and proportions with low maintenance gardens ensuring that it represents a brilliant down-size option with outstanding lock and leave credentials.
Upon entering the home you are greeted with a property that is well-designed and features a spacious feel and distinction. The stunning kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a generous bench, which leads to the impressively stylish and spacious lounge/dining area. Boasting 3 generous bedrooms, 2 with generous built in robes and the master bedroom offering a welcome hint of indulgence with an ensuite and walk-in robe.
To further compliment the home it's located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for. Only a short stroll to public transport, access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this superb location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
Insights: 2/9 Gaddang Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture Perfect, Complete with a Picket Fence!
Surrounded by lush, established gardens, this charming cottage offers a unique buying opportunity that is often sought yet rarely found.
Set behind a private high fence, this timeless abode is a sheer delight.
Split over 2 levels, the bottom comprises an open plan living with a cosy Coonara fire, dining and kitchen with SS appliances and an abundance of storage. 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes and a tranquil garden outlook, study nook, family bathroom and laundry complete this level. Float upstairs where you're welcomed by the 4th bedroom and an open 2nd living area with sliding door access to the balcony, which encompasses Bay views. The spacious master bedroom offers storage, serene bay windows and a fully equipped ensuite, making it the perfect parents retreat.
Set upon a generous 654m2 parcel, the back garden offers a wealth of opportunity and ready for you to add your own style - the choice is yours!
Located in a central pocket of Clifton Springs and with a rural aspect, this is perfect entry level buying on the booming Bellarine. Don't delay, this unique abode will not last long!

Description:
QUIET COURT POSITION WITH LOADS OF SPACE IN AND OUT, APP. 750 SQM.
Easy to relax and enjoy all that is offering here at No. 2, a formal lounge room, second extra spacious open living area with a great working kitchen and generous dining... with doors opening to the outside undercover decking, so much living. Four bedrooms, main with WIR and ensuite, two with BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include fans, gas heater, airconditioner, pantry, dishwasher, fernery, leadlight and new carpet in three rooms. Garage, extra space for boat/caravan and more vehicles. Close to parklands and walkways. An affordable option , please ring for inspection now.

Description:
Charming Bayside Living
Split over 2 levels, this spacious and well zoned family home offers incredible value for money. Refurbished throughout, with scope to add your own personal touches, this home will delight and is perfect for those needing space for the whole family or a savvy investment/holiday home.
Set behind a private high fence upon a 585m2 parcel, you're welcomed by hardwood timber floors, adding instant warmth and character to the home. The open living area with feature gas log fire, flows into the combined dining and kitchen, equipped with SS appliances and ample storage. 2 bedrooms, 2nd with BIR, a multipurpose study/sitting room, central bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with outdoor access all occupy the bottom level. Upstairs offers retreat style living, where a sundrenched 2nd living area offers Bay views and balcony, with the master bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite and 4th bedroom with BIR completing this well zoned family home.
Flanked for choice, the spacious back garden is a blank canvas, ready for you to get creative and make your own oasis! A SLUG with rear access into the backyard offers potential to house the boat, caravans, multiple car's and all toys in between!
Location is paramount and with Clifton Springs Primary, tennis courts, skate park and play area right across the road and the boat ramp, Bay, golf course and specialty shops only a short stroll away, you can't get more central or convenient than this!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Big Family Block with Big Potential
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac this more than generous 714m2 beauty which boasts an elevated position amongst the undulating surrounding landscape giving the lucky purchaser potential for amazing outlooks towards Curlewis and even the Bay! Given the ample block size the property also offers amazing scope to build a spacious family home and even fit the boat or caravan as well as a big backyard for the kids to play. This location is surely one to envy, you'll be able to enjoy walking distance to the beach and Clifton Springs Primary School as well as a wealth of amenities close by such as Drysdale shopping precinct, Day Care facilities, Curlewis shopping centre, Clifton Springs Golf club and many more. With title available you'll be able to get started on your new home immediately. Don't hesitate and call today.

Description:
Savvy Starter Oozing Retro Charm!
What an opportunity to secure your slice of the ever so popular Bellarine market! This solid brick beauty sits on a 591m2 block and offers itself in a multitude of ways and would be a fantastic first home, investor or next project.
Screened by an established, private front garden with a long, gated driveway leading to a SLUG offers ample room for multiple cars, caravans and everything in between for secure storage.
The home oozes original retro charm and allows for your imagine to run wild! The hub of the home lends itself in the way of a fully equipped and spacious kitchen which overlooks a light-filled living and dining space, equipped with a cosy wood log fire and split system offering all year-round comfort. A separate lounge sits at the fore, and comprises 3 large bedrooms all with built-in-robes, central family bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry sits at the rear and offers access to the lush back garden which offers dappled shade with an array of tree's, plants and planter boxes and all complete by a undercover verandah.
Leave the car at home, as a short stroll has you in the center of Drysdale and all amenities, schools, public transport and medical facilities. With the reserve and lake precinct at the end of the street, this property ticks all the boxes and offers incredible, entry level buying.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 117 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
One Of A Kind
This bespoke residence boasts a one of a kind sophistication that will excite a prospective purchaser with the highest of expectations! A visual delight; towering raked timber ceilings, feature pine-lined Clerestory windows promote an abundance of natural light, the free flowing floor plan creates a seamless connection to beautifully appointed hardwood decked alfresco (the perfect vantage point to admire the Heather Vincent designed garden setting), an enviable northerly aspect, this meticulously maintained build endorses this home has been very much loved and presents a genuine 'turn key' prospect all the hard work has been done! Set within the highly desirable Golf Course precinct and a short walk to the water's edge creates the ultimate 'sea change'!
3 beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with walk in robe and ensuite. The 2 additional bedrooms are generously proportioned and feature walk in robes.
The primary living zone consists of a light and bright kitchen/family/meals zone; wonderful use of windows give you a sense of bringing the picturesque surrounds 'inside'. The kitchen is complete with expansive bench tops, excellent storage and quality fixtures & fittings.
The 2nd independent living area is simply stunning and delivers a feeling of grandeur; showcasing a towering timber lined raked ceiling profile, exceptional size and scale, custom window furnishings, crisp neutral finishes compliment the warmth and character of the timber architraves/windows.
Without a doubt this home will appeal to the 'entertainer'; the expansive wrap around hardwood deck is accessible via dual Stegbar patio doors. An appealing spot to take in an early coffee or an evening glass of wine from one of the award-winning local wineries
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, x3 split system cooling units, ceiling fans all compliment a home boasting exceptional liveability features
The A+ location can simply not be understated; set right in the heart of the Golf Course precinct, the water's edge only a short stroll away, a fully equipped retail centre, public transport, tranquil parklands and walking tracks provide just a hint to the enviable lifestyle features on offer.
The Bellarine Peninsula has quickly established itself as one of the most highly sought 'sea change' destinations. Award winning wine labels, a vibrant restaurant and café scene, highly regarded fishing prospects and passenger ferry service to Docklands.
Insights: 117 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Seaside Living With Two Dwellings Under One Roof!
This property is currently UNDER OFFER subject to a condition to be met. If you are interested in the property, please feel free to contact Wes on 0419 315 727.
Showcasing two self-contained dwellings under one roof, this residence provides buyers with endless options! Occupy the upper level with sparkling bay views while you lease out the lower level, join the Airbnb trend and reap the benefits of a potential dual income, or secure a spacious holiday home for the whole family to enjoy!
With the coastline just 3 houses from your front door, a carefree lifestyle is yours to keep. Enjoy leisurely strolls along the sandy beach, spend fun-filled days swimming with the children and grandchildren, or snorkel to explore the beautiful reefs. A selection of the Bellarines finest wineries are virtually on your doorstep, while the boat ramp and Clifton Springs Golf Course are wonderfully close by. The Portarlington Ferry keeps you effortlessly connected to the Melbourne Docklands. Public transport and local shops are a short stroll away, while the bustling hub of Drysdale places all of the essentials within easy reach. Families will be spoilt for choice with easy access to Beacon Point Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, Drysdale Primary School and Christian College (Prep-9 Bellarine Campus).
Dwelling 1, Upstairs: - 212.90m2 (22.91 Sqrs) + Balcony 1- 13.73m2 (1.48 Sqrs) + Balcony 2- 56.60m2 (6.09 Sqrs) Total Area 283.24m2 (30.48 Sqrs)
High, square-set ceilings and Spotted Gum floorboards enhance the sleek interiors of 'The Main Dwelling'. The layout has been designed to maximise the northern light and showcase breathtaking views over the bay and You Yangs. The spacious lounge/living zone opens onto a balcony, while the kitchen/dining zone unites with another sheltered alfresco area. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a walk-in pantry and stainless-steel appliances (oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher). The Master Bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes, bathroom, separate toilet, and European laundry complete the upper level.
Dwelling 2, Ground Floor: - 154.37m2 (16.61 Sqrs) + Garage - 81.20m2 (8.74 Sqrs) + Outdoor Alfresco 53m2 (5.7Sqrs) Total Area 288.57m2 (31.06 Sqrs)
High, square-set ceilings and burnished concrete floors are featured throughout the lower level. The open plan family/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the spacious sheltered alfresco area creating a breezy indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for both everyday living and entertaining. The kitchen makes a stylish statement in black and white. The island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar, while appliances include an oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, and dishwasher. The generous Guest Bedroom overlooks the front garden with water views, while two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the sparkling bathroom. The powder room and laundry complete the lower level.
Other features of this superb property include raked and high set ceilings, double-glazing, solar panels & hydronic heating. With provisions in place for a lift, this home is also ideal for those planning to retire close to the sea. The remote lock-up garage provides secure parking for three vehicles, plus a rear remote roller door onto the backyard perfect for storing a boat or caravan! The double carport offers additional off-street parking. The secure backyard promotes sustainable living with a veggie garden, rainwater tank, and chook pen.
An opportunity like this doesnt come along often! Enquire today!

Description:
AN ABUNDANCE OF SPACE WITH BAY VIEWS
Situated in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs surrounded by quality homes and in close proximity to the golf club, bowls club & swimming beaches is this brilliant opportunity to secure a 1300m2 parcel of land with a spacious home. Offering 3 bedrooms downstairs including master with ensuite, study and multiple living spaces and 2 further bedrooms with retreat and balcony upstairs to enjoy beautiful sunsets and sweeping bay views. This home enjoys an open plan kitchen, dining and living space which flows out to an expansive deck overlooking the luxurious solar heated swimming pool, ideal for entertaining. There is ample storage space with a large shed, high set carport and workshop for the handy man or tradesman and those looking to store a boat or caravan. This unique property also features a rumpus room with separate access making it an ideal choice for those looking to run a business from home or a teenagers retreat. Further features of this fantastic home include ducted heating, split systems, wood fire, ducted vacuum system and an outdoor grassed play area. With so much space on offer, this home will appeal to growing and extended families and those needing extra storage and room to move!

Description:
Great Bones Here
As your walking to the front door you can see the bay, Geelong & even skilled stadium. Perfect 1st home or investment property on a terrific corner block of 581m2. Large light filled lounge has garden views, gas heater, split system & 2 ceiling fans. Open plan dining & timber kitchen has electric wall oven & grill plus a range hood over 4 electric hot plates. There are plenty cupboards for all your storage needs. Supersized bathroom has a deep bath, seperate shower & toilet. 2 big bedrooms one with free standing robes & the other has built in robes. Double linen closet in the hall just off the laundry that has rear yard access & pocket bay view's off the back porch. Outside is a garden shed, water tank & single car garage with double side gates giving you plenty of room to park your boat, caravan or tradies trailer. Surrounded by low maintenance gardens & new colour bond fences.
Just minutes to all amenities you could need including local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport & medical facilities. Plus everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.

Description:
A PERFECT HOME , DILIGENTLY MAINTAINED, GARDEN HAVEN!
What a delight this home is, you feel like you just what to stay and relax, so light and bright . Walk to the jetty, clubs and parklands, a great position. Formal lounge room at front with the second open plan living area at rear of home overlooking lush gardens and undercover patio. The master bedroom is at the front , has ensuite and WIR, remaining two are off the hallway at the rear, both have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features central heating, split system, pantry, dishwasher, quality fittings and more to impress. Double access allowing for multiple usage, double garage, caravan port and two workshops. So impressive has been much loved and it shows, come and have a look now.

Description:
A WONDERFUL SURPRISE! SOLAR PANELS! CARAVAN SPACE!
Take your time to come and view No. 11, it is diligently maintained and with the added bonus of nothing to do but unpack. A generous lounge room as well as second open plan living area including well equipped kitchen, dining and sitting area which opens to the outdoor entertaining space....a wealth of living all light and bright. The master bedroom has WIR and ensuite , remaining two with BIR'S, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry. Features include reverse cycle heating and cooling , solar panels cast iron fireplace, pantry, fans, excellent storage, quality fittings and more to impress. Double garage with direct home access, carport for the boat and/or caravan. This home makes the living easy on the Bellarine Penisula.

Description:
This Humble Abode is UNDER CONTRACT!
It's hard not to let this humble home tug on the heart strings, why? Because it feels like home from the moment you walk through the front door. 29 Amarina Road exudes an inviting feeling perhaps because of the cozy footprint or the light filled and airy renovated spaces, it's an ideal package which will tick off the criteria for the majority of the market.
A huge highlight of the home is the stunning location. Walking distance to the beach, golf course and the Dell you have no option but to inherit the fantastic lifestyle that is on offer.
This fastidiously kept home comprises three bedrooms, all with robes, separated by a centrally positioned modern bathroom. The light filled living area flows nicely into the kitchen/dining area. The kitchen is equipped with soft close cabinetry, quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. A fully functional laundry stems off the kitchen with external access.
All the hard work has been done, a clean crisp yet simple renovation means that you can move in right away, alternately a fantastic property to add to your investment portfolio. Other features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, re-painted, new floor furnishings, new internal lighting & single carport accommodation. The property also offers a secure rear yard with a large undercover and enclosed entertaining area, perfect for year round gatherings.
A truly rare package in a sought-after location, on offer at an affordable price. An inspection is a must to appreciate this meticulous little package!
Insights: 29 Amarina Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATELY PRESENTED
Here is a solid first home opportunity with all the bells and whistles. Modern kitchen and bathrooms, new floor coverings, fresh paintwork throughout, central heating and much more. For the young tradie there is massive secure parking under carport 13m long and garage approx 7.5m x 6m . Two additional garden sheds 3 x 3m with concrete flooring.
The home has a pleasant, welcoming feel with plenty of light filtering in to the living areas. Three good sized bedrooms, BIRs, fans, plenty of storage, 900ss Technika oven and SSDW.
The manicured, private front garden has an oriental feel. Close to public transport and only a few minutes in the car to the main Drysdale Shopping hub.

Description:
A HOUSE, A SHED AND 611 SQM
Thats what you are buying when you buy this Clifton Springs cracker. Set on 611 sq meters of land in a quiet Clifton Springs court and close to the under construction public play space is this ideal addition to your portfolio or first home. A quaint 2 bedroom home with pine lined ceilings and exposed beams is set at the front of the block allowing access to the massive 6m x 10m garage perfect for the tools, the toys & the trailers. Call today to book your inspection time so you don't miss this brilliant opportunity!

Description:
Tranquil Sea Change!
Beautifully placed within a green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs, this delightful residence boasts an unrivaled 'welcome home' feel! The custom build offers a lovely free flowing floor plan and dual light filled living zones courtesy of the northerly aspect. The stunning garden setting is sure to awaken your every sense; a visual spectacle in full bloom, the tranquillity of abundant bird life, lovely floral aromas and the impressive canopy of mature tree tops.
Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. The two additional bedrooms have built in robes
The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/meals area. The kitchen boasts expansive bench tops and great storage solutions. A glass sliding door creates a seamless connection to a private alfresco zone flanked by a glorious creeping vine
The second independent living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
A double garage with the enviable feature of drive through access via rear roller door; room enough for the cars, boat and even the jet ski (the ultimate sea change lifestyle prospect)
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, split system cooling, external rear block out blinds, feature brick pressed paving and many more fine inclusions to be discovered on further inspection
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; vibrant restaurant and cafe scene, award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the unforgettable panoramic views of the bay and granite peaks of the You Yangs.
Insights: 18 Derribong Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
SPIC and SPAN FAMILY HOME
Tastefully renovated and immaculately presented to the market for sale. This lovely property is located centrally to the local primary school, recreational facilities, boat ramp and the local shopping strip in Clifton Springs. The home has a spacious fully renovated kitchen with an open family living area that flows to a north facing entertaining deck with intermittent views of the bay. Blinds add privacy and protection from the elements.
There are three bedrooms in a separate wing with fully renovated, stylish family bathroom and ensuite.
No work to be done here carpets have been replaced, modern blinds installed and painting throughout.
Downstairs is a second living area, sleeping room for guests or the ultimate entertaining pad with access to the yard.
The yard is easy to maintain with a low care garden and a lovely secluded sitting area. Solar panels have been installed to provide energy efficiency and remote blinds to some windows. Do not wait to inspect this great property !

Description:
Where the Options are Endless!
An incredibly versatile floor plan split over 2 levels, matched with endless opportunities and a quiet court locale, this unique home is one not to be missed!
The home is perfect as is or could easily be transformed into your very own masterpiece. The low maintenance front garden offer a long driveway with access to the rear DLUG - ample room and storage for multiple cars, boats, caravans and all toys in between. Upon entry to the home you're welcomed by a sun-drenched living space, which effortlessly flows into the dining and fully equipped kitchen. 3 spacious bedrooms all with built-in-robes, master with en-suite, sit from the rear central hallway of the ground level and all complete by a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Float upstairs where Bay views are enjoyed from the open 2nd living area, where a further 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes are also on offer.
A sizeable 585m2 block offers a secure and spacious back garden, room for the whole family to run and enjoy!
Additional features of the home include - split system heating and cooling, log fire, ceiling fans, manicured gardens both front and back.
Whether you're needing room for the growing family, a potential dual occupancy set up or looking for your next project, this charming abode will delight!

Description:
VIEWS ALL DAY LONG !
If views of the water are what you desire then 19 Tingara provides them a plenty ! Elevated to capture the stunning outlook from the wrap around balcony, natural light floods in to the massive living areas from the east and west. Panoramic northerly views are a feature across the water to the You Yangs and Mt Anakie.
This established brick veneer home longs for that modern update to bring it back to it's former glory. On entry at the ground floor level there is potential for the third bedroom and adjacent powder room/ garage to become a self contained retreat.
Upstairs the spacious kitchen-dining area has access to the under cover deck. A new oven & cook top, DW and plenty of storage in this very workable kitchen ! The main bedroom suite has ample storage and a spacious ensuite, the second bedroom, a family bathroom and laundry complete this level. Many more features make this a great property to consider - gas central heating, ducted vacuum, massive underfloor storage space, over sized double garage with room for a work shop at the rear, rear access from the garage and still more !! there is side access beside the garage large enough for a van or boat on this 713m2
Please contact the agent directly to organise a private inspection.
Disclaimer:

Description:
Blink and you WILL miss this!
Million-dollar Bay views, a quality renovation throughout, all while being a mere 400 metres from the water's edge. Positioned arguably at one of Clifton Springs best addresses, blink and I assure you, it will be missed!
Showcasing the utmost quality and design throughout, the elevated position and north/westerly aspect allows an abundance of natural light to stream through, giving it a light, bright and airy feel. The main hub of the home comprises an open plan kitchen with SS appliances and 40mm stone benchtops, dining and a spacious living area. 3 bedrooms sit from the central hallway, the master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, while the remaining 2 offer BIR's. A feature barn sliding door leads into the luxe bathroom, boasting stone top vanity, corner shower and free-standing bathtub, with a separate toilet and laundry with outdoor access completing this neat as a pin and stylish abode.
The backyard is a blank canvas and offers incredible views. Deck out as an impressive outdoor entertaining area to capture the best of the Bay, keep as is for an open grassed space for the kids to run amuck or utilise it as additional storage for multiple cars, trailers, boats, as double gates from High Ridge Drive makes for easy access - the options are truly endless!
Additional Features Include Ducted Heating, 2 split systems (living & master bedroom), stone benchtops throughout, quality fixtures and fittings, abundance of storage, oversized DLUG with workbench and external access and a 581m2 corner block allotment.
Watch the world pass by from your front verandah, while enjoying the endless views. Beacon Point Reserve, beach access and public transports are all at your front door, while all major amenities, the boat ramp, golf club and finest wineries and eateries are only moments away.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 25 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Coast Meets Country
This near new, 18-month-old home offers low maintenance, contemporary living, set within a private cul-de-sac and offering a unique rural outlook all upon a 491m2 block.
The home is light, bright and offers a neutral colour palette throughout. The fully equipped kitchen with 900ml electric oven, 5 burner gas cook top and 40ml stone benchtops, also offers a spacious walk-in-pantry and overlooks the dining and open living space. Well zoned, the master bedroom sits at the fore of the home with walk-in-robe and ensuite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms offer built-in-robes. A separate lounge, study nook, central bathroom and laundry complete this neat as a pin abode.
The serene rural outlook can be enjoyed from the main hub of the home, before sliding doors provide access to the extended outdoor undercover entertaining space, with a second undercover pergola also on offer.
Additional features include ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, an abundance of storage, DLUG with internal and external access, over-sized garden shed, low maintenance gardens front and back and all complete with additional side storage for multiple cars, caravans, boats or the trailer.
A tightly held pocket close to public transport, major amenities, and the best of the Bellarine all at your fingertips, this home will suit anyone from first home buyers, the growing family or downsizers who are still looking for space to tinker!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
